Change Log

All notable changes to this resolver will be documented in this file. This project adheres to Semantic Versioning. This change log adheres to standards from Keep a CHANGELOG.

Unreleased

v0.3.1 - 2017-06-23

### Changed - bumped debug dep to match other packages

v0.3.0 - 2016-12-15

### Changed - bumped resolve to fix issues with Node builtins (thanks @SkeLLLa and @ljharb)

Fixed

  • use files in package.json to ship only index.js (#531, thanks for noticing @lukeapage)

v0.2.3 - 2016-08-20

### Added - debug logging (use DEBUG=eslint-plugin-import:resolver:node eslint [...])

v0.2.2 - 2016-07-14
